Text: Hey all!  Just realized I dropped the ball on one little item here... although I tagged the hell out of them, the MP3 tracks have generic names in their folder.  No big deal, I dragged it into my iPod and got great results, the tags are perfect in the player & it sounds SWEET!  If you wish to rename the individual files in your hard drive it should be easy enough.  My most humble apologies, peeps... ;-)
Thank you very much for this gold album. It's in the same level and not less with The Mix from Kraftwerk !!!
